data.title: Long Island News, Insights & Articles

Navigating the Potential Perils of Consuming Alcohol at Holiday Company Parties

Wednesday, December 5, 2018 - (Long Island, NY) The holiday season is upon us, a time that typically results in a busier social calendar for most people…especially when it comes to the time-honored tradition of company parties. At such events, the stuffy and professional demeanor that is normally associated with the ... by Ralph

Long Island Legal Experts Offer Tips on Removing Online Mug Shots, Arrest Reports

Wednesday, December 20, 2017 - (Long Island, NY) What do Las Vegas and the internet have in common? It’s simple…what goes there, stays there, and in the case of the internet, that may not be a good thing if you’ve been accused of a crime. In the digital age, anonymity is a commodity, as almost everything ... by John

Online Commercial Printing Company Printleaf Upgrading to Offer Next-Day Deliveries

Monday, December 11, 2017 - (New York, NY) Printleaf , an online commercial printing company, which services the local NYC & Long Island areas, is upgrading their printing services to offer next day deliveries today. Printleaf’s new service guarantees your large format prints will arrive at your door the ... by Janet

Fisher Stone, P.C. Unveils Free Business Startup Course in NYC & Long Island

Thursday, December 7, 2017 - (Long Island, NY) Fisher Stone P.C. launched an exclusive entrepreneurs only program for business owners and startups. The program features classes, programs and documents that are the lifeline of any startup. The courses are available at their Manhattan office and are open to startups from ... by John

Sunrun Launches Brightbox Solar and Battery Storage Solution in Long Island

Thursday, December 7, 2017 - Battery Solution Will Give East Coast Homeowners Peace of Mind with Backup Energy to Power Through Natural Disasters (Long Island, NY) Sunrun Inc. Win A Car Or Cash – ELIH Auxiliary Car Raffle Now Underway

Friday, March 25, 2016 - March 25, 2016 - The Eastern Long Island Hospital Auxiliary is once again teaming up with Mullen Motors of Southold for its 11th Annual Car Raffle. The Auxiliary will offer the lucky winner a choice of $15,000 in cash or a beautiful new 2016 Chrysler 200. The Chrysler 200 is the only car in ... by Cait

Jason Zove Opening Office in Smithtown to Further Grassroots Campaign Effort

Wednesday, August 20, 2014 - Smithtown, NY - August 20, 2014 - Jason Zove, candidate for New York State's 8th Assembly District, is hosting his campaign office opening at 10am this Saturday, August 23rd, at 77 W. Main Street in Smithtown. "This office opening allows us to launch a district-wide grassroots operation ... by John

“Princesses: Long Island” Likely Cancelled

Wednesday, April 9, 2014 - “Princesses: Long Island,” a reality show on Bravo which debuted last year, has been cancelled. The show had its fans, but it had a much larger number of detractors who had serious issues with the content. From the first episode of the first season, “Princesses: Long ... by John

SBPLI Announces Winners of Robotics Competition

Tuesday, April 8, 2014 - The 15 th Annual SBPLI Long Island Regional FIRST Robotics Competition just wrapped up at Hofstra University. The competition took place on March 27 th -29 th , and the winners have just been announced. Over 2,000 students from 50 different high schools attended, most from the New ... by John
